Articles.Content: Floor 1651-You're in the middle of Night Vale's forbidden dog park, You hurry up the stairs to floor 1652
Floor 1652: A bunch of dead memes are discussing the future of the meme economy.
Floor 1656: keosyncronous orbit
Floor 1654: 1653 was a liar.

floor 1655:

Soyuz TMA 19M (Tim Peake included)

floor 1666: You have become W O K E.

Edited December 6, 2017 by Matuchkin
floor 1667: floor 666+1001 (1667) the great fire of london (1 floor late)

24 minutes ago, kerbinorbiter said:

floor 1667: floor 666+1001 (1667) the great fire of london (1 floor late)

floor 1668: One of the walls is not there, and a diving plank is positioned at the precipice.

Floor 1669:

T- 300 years and counting until the apollo 11 mission
Floor 1670: the room is so boring that it will not be described for fear of making everyone who reads this extremely bored.

Floor 1670-Pickle jars are jumping out the window.

You walk up three steps and find an elevator. You open the door, reveling more stairs.

floor 1675:

"Hey look at my awsome house!"

thats a wall.
Floor 1676: You learn that we skipped ten floors.

Floor 1777: You learn that you actually skipped 5 floors, and that you were on floor 1670 two times even though you climbed the stairs up each time. You don't question that, since you're probably not surprised anymore after what happened on all the previous floors.
Floor 1778: You find another empty room, and realize you skipped 100 floors. You question who designed this building.
Floor 1779: You are in a large room with many windows and a sign that says, "Closeup of Mun: 5."
Floor 1780: It appears to be the past three floors clipping over one another
Floor 1781: You see America's founding fathers developing what they call the "Articles of Confederation"

Floor 1782:

you see something, but then immediately forget what it is in the time it takes to figure out what it is

Edited June 12, 2017 by StupidAndy
Floor 1782: You see a room full of 12 billion versions of you. You quickly ascend to the next floor

1782:  Nasty, shimmering patches of air float along the stairwells in this odd place. Strange lights sometimes dance in attendance. Far-off places can be glimpsed. Don't walk through these. There are worse places than this bizzare edifice.
1783: You find yourself in the physical representation of the KSP forums...

1784:  You stand within a hall of statues. Each is massive, much larger than life, as if together they represent a race of giants. There are long-dead kings and queens, armoured soldiers and cloaked clergy. Your footsteps echo: this place must be as big as ten cathedrals.

The marble giants stand above their own tombs. Some of these huge sarcophagi are empty. The lid of one has been pushed aside. You walk over to it. On the base of the statue are carved the words "Continue upward".

 

You take to the stairwell yet again...

1785: It is the earth in the year 1785 because that is the floor idk man

Edited June 12, 2017 by Kosmonaut
